title: Airplay - Same(AOR/Westcoast Rock from 1980)
description:
Airplay - Same(1980)

Airplay was a short-lived American band, formed by David Foster and Jay Graydon. The band released a self-titled album in 1980, containing "Nothin' You Can Do About It" (later recorded by Manhattan Transfer) and a cover of the Earth, Wind & Fire hit "After the Love Has Gone", written by Foster and Graydon with Bill Champlin.(Wikipedia)

Members
Jay Graydon (vocals, guitar)
David Foster (keyboards)
Tommy Funderburk (vocals)

Backing musicians

Toto members:
Jeff Porcaro (drums)
David Hungate (bass)
Steve Lukather (additional rhythm guitars)
Steve Porcaro (synthesizer programming)

Songs

1. Stranded
2. Cryin' all night
3. It will be alright
4. Nothin' you can do about it
5. Should we carry on
6. Leave me alone
7. Sweet body
8. Bix
9. She waits for me
10. After the love has gone
